e="preserve">Ali Rizvi (born 3 March 1982), is an Pakistani film actor, known for his work predominantly in Pakistani cinema, as well as his works in Theater and Tv. Film critics, contemporaries and other experts consider him to be one of the finest actors in Pakistani Cinema for his versatile and natural acting. In 2018, For the first time he was nominated as the best supporting actor in Lux Style Awards.
Biography.
Ali Rizvi started his career in the field of advertising then went on to learn the art of storytelling though theater, film, tv and dramatics. He believes people connect with people and story is a very powerful tool to engage them.
